response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the strategic advantage this product can provide to your company. I am confident that you will find it to be an excellent investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
